Description: Annual income of the applicant (in decile form).
Metric of similarity between email and applicant’s name. Higher values represent higher similarity.

Value: Ranges between [−1, 380] months (-1 is a missing value).
Description: Number of months in previous registered address of the applicant, i.e. the applicant’s previous residence, if applicable.

Value: Ranges between [−1, 429] months (-1 is a missing value).
Description: Months in currently registered address of the applicant.
Applicant’s age in years, rounded to the decade.
Number of days passed since application was done.
Initial transferred amount for application.
Credit payment plan type.
Number of applications within same zip code in last 4 weeks.
Velocity of total applications made in last 6 hours i.e., average number of applications per hour in the last 6 hours.
Velocity of total applications made in last 24 hours i.e., average number of applications per hour in the last 24 hours.
Velocity of total applications made in last 4 weeks, i.e., average number of applications per hour in the last 4 weeks.
Number of total applications in the selected bank branch in last 8 weeks.
Number of emails for applicants with same date of birth in last 4 weeks.
Employment status of the applicant.
Internal score of application risk.
Domain of application email (either free or paid).
Current residential status for applicant.
Validity of provided home phone.
Validity of provided mobile phone.

Value: Ranges between [−1, 32] months (-1 is a missing value).
Description: How old is previous account (if held) in months.
If applicant has other cards from the same banking company.
Applicant’s proposed credit limit.
If origin country of request is different from bank’s country.
Online source of application.
Length of user session in banking website in minutes.

Value: Possible values are Windows, macOS, Linux, X11, or other.
Description: Operative system of device that made request.
User option on session logout.
Number of distinct emails in banking website from the used device in last 8 weeks.
Number of fraudulent applications with used device.
